plot: Sprinkled with hilarious notes of cultural clashes and an endearing display of the kindness of strangers, this idiosyncratic "comedy drama" will warm hearts in the most unexpected way.
title: Sev beni
plot_es: Sprinkled with hilarious notes of cultural clashes and an endearing display of the kindness of strangers, this idiosyncratic "comedy drama" will warm hearts in the most unexpected way.
